events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund because I need a different size.
The customer has reported an issue regarding an item return and refund request due to size mismatch.
Assigning this refund case to the Returns Specialist team to handle the customer's request promptly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please confirm if the jacket has been used or washed, and do you still have the original packaging?
No, I haven’t used or washed the jacket yet, and the packaging is intact as I just received it last week.
Thank you for confirming. You can return the jacket in original condition for a full refund. I'll email you the prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and the return label. I’ll send it back as soon as I receive the label.
We have sent you the return label via email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm if you have shipped the jacket back and to see if you need any further assistance.
Hi, yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday using the provided label. Looking forward to the refund.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund today. The amount should reflect in your account shortly.
We appreciate your business. Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help us improve.
Your refund case is now closed. Thank you for your patience, and please contact us if you need further assistance.
